mods.abstract: Performance and harmonic demonstration by Charlie McCoy from the Ford Theater at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum on March 9, 2015. Joined by musician Hoot Hester.

subject.topic: Country Music Hall of Fame & Museum (Nashville, Tenn.)
